page.title: 16BROOK VILLAGE
page.content: { Brook}is a very small village and it won the'Best Kept Village'award in 1970.There are two telephone boxes and one letter box.There aren't any schools or hospitals.There is an animal sanctuary that takes almost any animals.There are 60 cats, 100 hens, 600 donkeys,10 geese and about 20 dogs.(figures correct in June 1985) {The Dog and Pheasant Public House.} The Dog and Pheasant was a medieval hall house.This type of hall house was called a wealden hall.The top part of the walls are all newly built on but the bottom is all the original stone.It was built in the late 15th century,and is covered in Horsham stone slab.It also has the original roof.The Dog and Pheasant is now a pub and restaurant.The landlord says that the customers are 25% travellers and 75% local customers.
